name: Swan Queen lace & silk bridal kimono robe
description:
Luxurious kimono robe handmade in French lace featuring a breathtaking floral design with scalloped edges on front and sleeves. Fully lined bodice in skin color silk chiffon, sheer sleeves, french seamed. Finished with a soft silk tie belt. 

Sure to be an stunning piece for some really beautiful getting ready photos on your wedding day!

Made to order time-frame: 1-2 days

Photography credits: 

2nd image: Three Nails Photography

Others: Yuna leonard

name: Samantha Silk bridal kimono getting ready robe in rose pink
description:
The Samantha silk robe is a new "getting ready" style from my Spring 2013 collection. 

This romantic yet modern robe is handmade with couture quality silk and details.

Made of a luxurious 100% silk charmeuse in lovely rose pink shade.

Features: dropped shoulders, kimono sleeves, & obi style sash. slips on. 100% silk. Dry clean.

One size fits most. Comfortably fits a US size 0-12. Other colors available in my shop.

$169 for each robe; discounts available for orders of 3+ robes. Perfect for bridesmaids parties!

Other colors and sizes are made to order. Please allow between 2-4 weeks for custom orders.

name: Samantha Silk bridal robe getting ready kimono in floral watercolor
description:
The Samantha silk robe is handmade with couture quality silk and details.

Made of a luxurious Italian silk charmeuse - custom printed silk in floral watercolor shades. It has a romantic yet modern look. Features: dropped shoulders, kimono sleeves, & obi style sash. slips on. 100% silk. Dry clean.

One size fits most. Comfortably fits a US size 0-12. 

***

Shipping within USA is always FREE and includes delivery confirmation. I ll be happy to ship this worldwide, please check the rates listed below. Feel free to message me with any questions.

Thank you!

name: Kate French Lace wedding robe wrap in off white
description:
The perfect robe to wear while you're getting ready to walk down the aisle! The gorgeous French lace with scalloped edges will make you feel like royalty.

Luxurious robe hand-cut in French leavers lace featuring gorgeous floral design with scalloped edges on hem and sleeves and finished with a french grosgrain attached tie belt 

Fabrication: French lace.

name: Kate French Lace & silk lined wedding robe wrap in off white
description:
The perfect wrap to wear while you're getting ready to walk down the aisle! This gorgeous French lace with scalloped edges will make you feel like royalty!

Luxurious robe hand-cut in French leavers lace and lined with silk chiffon in skin color. Features gorgeous floral design with scalloped edges on hem and sleeves and finished with a french grosgrain attached tie belt 

Fabrication: French lace. Lining: 100 % silk.

It can also be lined in other colors like off-white, blush, baby blue, or come unlined.

name: Swan Queen lace & silk bridal kimono robe in blush
description:

Luxurious kimono robe handmade in French lace featuring a breathtaking floral design with scalloped edges on front and sleeves. Fully lined bodice in Blush color silk chiffon, sheer sleeves, french seamed. Finished with a soft silk tie belt.

name: The Odette french lace & silk lined bridal kimono robe
description:
This is the lined version of the Odette lace kimono robe from my new Bridal Spring 2013 collection. 

Sure to be an stunning piece for some really beautiful getting ready photos on your wedding day!

Luxurious kimono robe handmade in French lace featuring a breathtaking floral design with scalloped edges on front and sleeves, lined in skin color silk chiffon, french seamed. Finished with a soft silk charmeuse tie belt. 

Robe pictured is lined in skin color silk chiffon.

Made to order time-frame: 1-2 days

name: Krista Italian guipure lace cap sleeves bolero shrug
description:
Handmade means - Made with love - Especially for you.

This luxurious shrug has the feel of an exquisite vintage piece. I designed this shrug with lots of love and attention to details. Slip on this scalloped edge bolero shrug over a strapless gown to finish off an stunning bridal look! 

It’s made of the highest quality Italian guipure lace with flattering cap sleeves, elegant high neck, beautiful scalloped edges and flower-patterned lace embroidery all over. 

Colors available: off white & black

This bridal shrug is made to order. Please allow 1-2 weeks for this item to be handmade before shipment.

name: Amber French lace and tulle cap sleeve bridal cover up bolero shrug
description:
Amber is a couture piece: delicate and light with gorgeous hand cut lace appliqué to English tulle and cap sleeves.

Slip on this delicate shrug over a strapless gown to finish off an stunning bridal look.

Fabrication: French lace an English tulle.

Available in: ivory and black.

Amber is custom made with your own measurements and made to order. Please allow 1-3 weeks for this item to be handmade before shipment. You'll be contacted to make arrangements as soon as your order is received.

name: Krista Italian Guipure lace bolero shrug in off white
description:
This luxurious shrug has the feel of an exquisite vintage piece. I designed this shrug with lots of love and attention to details. Slip on this scalloped edge bolero shrug over a strapless gown to finish off an stunning bridal look! 

It’s made of the highest quality Italian guipure lace with long sleeves, elegant high neck, beautiful scalloped edges and flower-patterned lace embroidery all over. 

This bridal shrug is made to order. Please allow 1-2 weeks for this item to be handmade before shipment.

name: Krista Italian Guipure lace bolero shrug in black
description:

name: Black Swan french lace scalloped tunic off white
description:
Scoop neck lace tunic handmade in French lace with breathtaking floral design. 

Features an exposed zip at the back, scalloped edges at the asymmetrical hem and cuffs with slightly puffed elbow bell sleeves. Perfect over a tank with your favorite black pants & pumps!

Fabrication: French lace.

name: First Date Silk scalloped blouse off white
description:
The “First Date" scalloped silk blouse is a vintage inspired top that embodies the energy and femininity of my new Spring 2012 Collection.

It has a vintage yet modern look in a flattering silhouette. Luxuriously soft to the touch, it’s made of luxurious silk charmeuse in a neutral off-white shade.

Wear this pretty blouse with pants and flats for day, switching to a tailored skirt and heels for a polished evening look! This blouse is so versatile and well made that you are sure to enjoy it for years to come…

Details - Made of 100% silk charmeuse fabric, top is lined in the same silk charmeuse fabric, slips on, scalloped scoop neck, scalloped low back, short sleeves, dry clean or hand wash cold, lay flat to dry.

Sizes ready to ship:

Off-white: XS, S, M & L

name: Spring Blossom Floral Silk organza lace blouse
description:
Whimsical and dream-like, this one of a kind blouse is crafted in exquisite embroidered silk organza with subtle cap sleeves. Beautiful floral appliqués on a playful open back complete this stunning look from my Spring 2012 collection " Dream a little dream"

Details - Made of 100% embroidered silk organza, open back with floral appliques, semi sheer, dry clean or hand wash cold, lay flat to dry.

*** This blouse is a limited edition & made to order - please allow 3-4 weeks for this item to be handmade before shipment ***

name: Chloe scalloped floral lace top
description:
Handmade means - Made with love - Especially for you.

This gorgeous embroidered floral lace top is the perfect cover up for your wedding ceremony. Sure to wow on your wedding day! 

Details – Made of delicate sheer French chantilly lace with scalloped edges, elbow sleeves and loop closure with silk covered buttons down the back. 

It's the perfect touch of vintage and classic, yet modern!


*Made to order. Please allow 4-7 weeks for this item to be handmade before shipment*

name: Rosalie couture french lace bolero shrug in rose gold
description:
An exquisite lace piece that is sure to wow on any event. 

Handmade in couture-quality French chantilly lace with breathtaking rose designs in shades of blush and gold with scalloped edges and a fitted silhouette. 

Details – blush gold - Made of hand-cut French chatilly lace with beautiful scalloped edges, elegant high neck, french seams and flower-patterned lace all over.

Made to order with your own measurements. It can be custom made too. Please allow 1-2 weeks for this item to be handmade before shipment. You'll be contacted to make arrangements as soon as your order is received.

name: Valerie french lace bolero shrug cover up in ivory
description:
This luxurious lace cover up is handmade in French lace featuring a breathtaking floral design with scalloped edges on front, back and sleeves.

Slip on this scalloped edge bolero shrug over a strapless gown to finish off an stunning bridal look! 

Fabrication: French lace.

name: Rosalie Bridal french lace bolero shrug in ivory
description:
An exquisite lace piece that is sure to wow on your wedding day!

Handmade in breathtaking couture-quality French chantilly lace with scalloped edges and a fitted silhouette. Available in ivory, white and black.


Details – Ivory - Made of hand-cut French chatilly lace with beautiful scalloped edges, elegant high neck, french seams and flower-patterned lace all over.

Made to order with your own measurements. It can be custom made too. Please allow 1-2 weeks for this item to be handmade before shipment. You'll be contacted to make arrangements as soon as your order is received.

Feel free to message me with any questions!

description: A classic button down shirt reinvented with tunic length, raglan sleeves, lace back with ruched detail and soft pleating on sleeve cuffs.

options.name: Off-white - One size fits most - Ready to ship

name: Black Swan Pink Boucle Tweed Coat
description:
Boucle pink coat inspired by the movie: Black Swan

Some time ago I went to see the “Black Swan”. The movie was awesome … it’s a beautiful film, not to mention that I fell in love with Natalie Portman’s wardrobe!

Much of the film she spotted a light pink coat with a white scarf – so stylish and lovely! I loved this look so much so I searched for this outfit online. After searching for many days I realized that all clothes on the film were specially made for it…so I decided to make one my own.

This order will be shipped in 3-5 weeks. I also can make this coat in compliance with your wish and your size. The custom request will take between 4-8 weeks.

Size S measures:

Bust length (laying flat closed): 17-18 inches
Sleeve length (measured from shoulder): 25-26 inches
Coat length: 32 inches

Due to a limited supply I have of this pink fabric, these are made to order.

name: Nina ballerina watercolor print silk blouse
description:
The Nina silk chiffon blouse is a feminine with an edge piece that you can wear all year long. It’s so delicate and looks so unique! Wear this blouse with white skinny jeans and ballet flats for effortless style. 

Crafted from a pure italian silk printed with watercolor ballerinas illustrations all over...so cute!

Details: 100 % silk chiffon, sheer, relaxed style, exposed top button with a concealed button placket, cap sleeves and shirttail hem.

Sizes ready to ship: S, M & L

It has a vintage yet modern look in a flattering silhouette. Luxuriously soft to the touch, it’s made of luxurious silk charmeuse in new Spring colors!

name: Eliza bridal french lace and tulle bridal bolero shrug cover up
description:
Eliza is a couture piece: delicate and light with gorgeous French lace details.  Hand cut appliqué lace to English tulle makes the perfect addition to your wedding day look. Pictured with elbow sleeves, can be made with cap sleeves as well.

Slip on this ethereal shrug over a strapless gown to finish off an stunning bridal look! 

Fabrication: French lace an English tulle.

Available in: ivory, white and black.

Eliza is custom made with your own measurements and made to order. Please allow 3-7 weeks for this item to be handmade before shipment. You'll be contacted to make arrangements as soon as your order is received.
